subject: Re: [junit] setting class path for junit in xp
msgSnippet: ... Please read the FAQ. This class is not in junit.jar. The tests ship as loose class files with junit.zip. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
fouad_baig wrote:

> I am having problems setting up the classpath for junit in XP. i hav
> installed juint in d:\Juint.
>
> i hav created a CLASSPATH variable in system variables and i hav set
> up my classpath as follows:
> setclasspath=classpath%.;d:\Junit\junit.jar
>
> but when i try running the sample test programs i get the follwoing
> error msg: class not found "junit.sample.AllTests"

Please read the FAQ. This class is not in junit.jar. The tests ship as
loose class files with junit.zip.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
